official_title: To require the coverage of testing for certain sexually transmitted infections without the imposition of cost sharing, and for other purposes.

summary.text:
Equity in STD Testing Act

This bill provides for coverage, without cost-sharing, of testing for certain sexually transmitted diseases under Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP), TRICARE, Department of Veterans Affairs health benefits, and the Indian Health Service.

titles.title: To require the coverage of testing for certain sexually transmitted infections without the imposition of cost sharing, and for other purposes.
